name: part_002
file: tmp_【#ノエル生誕はっぴーLIVE】今日は誕生日！！好きなことしてはっぴーになろおおお✨【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [E1HXg-kjOI8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Choco (MC) discusses the gyudon with Noel and Iroha, who are blindfolded and tasting samples. They discuss the ginger flavor and Noel's voracious appetite.
The tasting of the third gyudon sample begins. The participants comment on the sweetness and the onions before finishing.
Choco instructs the participants to remove their blindfolds and prepare their final answers for the contest.
Noel reveals her answers and explains her reasoning, detailing the differences in flavor, color, and texture between the samples.

subtitles.original: へ？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: ちなみにね 今持ってる 風真様のね あのスプーン
subtitles.english: By the way, that spoon Kazama-sama is holding...

subtitles.original: お肉が１つも乗っておりません！
subtitles.english: Doesn't have a single piece of meat on it!

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って！
subtitles.english: Wait a minute!

subtitles.original: あれ？見えないでござる！
subtitles.english: Wait, I can't see!

subtitles.original: 嘘 これご飯？
subtitles.english: No way, is this just rice?

subtitles.original: しょうがないわね ちょっと貸しなさい
subtitles.english: Oh, fine then. Here, let me help.

subtitles.original: あ ありがとうございます え これご飯？
subtitles.english: T-Thank you. Wait, is this just rice?

subtitles.original: うん ご飯だけ
subtitles.english: Yeah, just rice.

subtitles.original: あれ？ ご飯だけなのよ 風真殿
subtitles.english: Wait, it's just rice, Kazama-dono.

subtitles.original: やはり やはり肉は避けていくのか 風真のことを
subtitles.english: Is the meat... is the meat avoiding me after all?

subtitles.original: おかしいわね はい あーん
subtitles.english: That's strange. Here, say 'ah'.

subtitles.original: え？ お口開けて？ はい あーん
subtitles.english: Eh? Open your mouth. Come on, 'ah'.

subtitles.original: 美味しい？
subtitles.english: Is it good?

subtitles.original: うんうん
subtitles.english: Mm-hmm.

subtitles.original: 牛丼はうめえよな 何だろう
subtitles.english: Gyudon really is the best. What is this...?

subtitles.original: めっちゃ嗅いでる
subtitles.english: She's smelling it a lot.

subtitles.original: 生姜みたいな匂いする
subtitles.english: It smells like ginger.

subtitles.original: あ 生姜！ 分かる
subtitles.english: Ah, ginger! I get it.

subtitles.original: うん 生姜効いてる
subtitles.english: Yeah, the ginger's strong.

subtitles.original: ノエル様もう半分以上食べてんだけど やばいって
subtitles.english: Noel-sama's already eaten more than half! This is bad.

subtitles.original: 肉の 何だろう
subtitles.english: The meat's... how do I put it...?

subtitles.original: こうフォースを感じる 肉のフォースを感じるから
subtitles.english: I can feel the force. I feel the meat's force.

subtitles.original: 見なくても食べれる
subtitles.english: So I can eat it without looking.

subtitles.original: あ 今食べてるのは白米だけですわ
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm only eating white rice right now.

subtitles.original: 強すぎる あーい それではね
subtitles.english: You're too much. Alright, then...

subtitles.original: そろそろ３杯目の方 試食していきましょう
subtitles.english: Let's move on to tasting the third bowl.

subtitles.original: ３食目 試食スタート！
subtitles.english: Third meal tasting, start!

subtitles.original: はい いただきます
subtitles.english: Alright, let's eat.

subtitles.original: 良い匂いする
subtitles.english: It smells good.

subtitles.original: あ 良い匂いする 甘めな匂いがするね
subtitles.english: Oh, it does. It has a sweet smell.

subtitles.original: うーん！ うーん！
subtitles.english: Mmm! Mmm!

subtitles.original: おっと 反応が今までとちょっと違うぞ
subtitles.english: Whoa, the reaction is a bit different this time.

subtitles.original: え 美味い おっと
subtitles.english: Eh, it's good! Oh?

subtitles.original: どうですか？ ノエル様
subtitles.english: How is it, Noel-sama?

subtitles.original: 美味しい うまい
subtitles.english: Delicious. It's good.

subtitles.original: 何か味が染みてる
subtitles.english: The flavor's really soaked in.

subtitles.original: うん 染みてる？ うん 染みわたってるわ
subtitles.english: Yeah, soaked in? Yeah, it's permeated.

subtitles.original: 風真殿は？
subtitles.english: And Kazama-dono?

subtitles.original: 美味しい 何か玉ねぎとお肉 ちゃんと両方の味がする
subtitles.english: It's good! I can taste both the onion and the meat.

subtitles.original: あら 玉ねぎが
subtitles.english: Oh, the onions...?

subtitles.original: 何かね 甘い 甘い！
subtitles.english: They're, like, sweet. So sweet!

subtitles.original: ええ そうなの？ そうなの？
subtitles.english: Eh, is that so? Really?

subtitles.original: そう 甘さを感じるな
subtitles.english: Yes, I can definitely taste the sweetness.

subtitles.original: どう？ どう？ 甘い？
subtitles.english: Well? Is it sweet?

subtitles.original: 甘い 甘いです 今までで一番甘い
subtitles.english: Sweet. It's sweet. The sweetest so far.

subtitles.original: 一番甘い そう 甘さを感じるね めっちゃ美味しい 甘くて
subtitles.english: The sweetest? Yeah, it's sweet. It's very delicious and sweet.

subtitles.original: 甘さを感じます おら 最後何かめちゃめちゃ好評ね
subtitles.english: I can taste the sweetness. Wow, this last one is very popular.

subtitles.original: あーい そしたらね 皆様 後ろを向いていただいて
subtitles.english: Alright, then. Everyone, please turn around.

subtitles.original: はい いいですか？ 目隠しの方 お取りください
subtitles.english: Okay, are you ready? Please remove your blindfolds.

subtitles.original: あ 世界が明るい あ 明るい まぶしい まぶしい
subtitles.english: Ah, the world is so bright! It's so bright! Blinding!

subtitles.original: え ノエル先輩そんな どうやって食べたの？ すごい 完食できてる
subtitles.english: Eh, Noel-senpai, how did you eat that much? Amazing, you finished it!

subtitles.original: ご回答のご記入 よろしくお願いします
subtitles.english: Please write down your answers.

subtitles.original: もう ノエル様はね 簡単でしょう
subtitles.english: For Noel-sama, this must be easy.

subtitles.original: え 風真殿は？ 書けてるかな よいしょ ピー
subtitles.english: What about Kazama-dono? Is she writing? There we go.

subtitles.original: あれ？ 風真ちゃん 悩んでるのかな あれあれ？
subtitles.english: Wait, is Kazama-chan struggling? Oh?

subtitles.original: おっと もうノエル様は余裕だな あらー
subtitles.english: Whoa, Noel-sama's already done. Wow.

subtitles.original: もう口の中が答え知ってるからね あらー
subtitles.english: My mouth already knows the answer. Wow.

subtitles.original: それではね 回答見てみましょうか
subtitles.english: Well then, let's see the answers.

subtitles.original: ノエル様の回答を ドドン！
subtitles.english: Noel-sama's answer is... Ta-da!

subtitles.original:
A 高級牛丼
B 一般的牛丼
C ちょこ先♡♡♡
subtitles.english:
A: High-end Gyudon
B: Generic Gyudon
C: Choco-seni♡♡♡

subtitles.original: はい これです
subtitles.english: Yes, here it is.

subtitles.original: あーい じゃあちょっと読み上げてもらってもいいですか？
subtitles.english: Alright, could you read them out for us?

subtitles.original: 一番最初に食べた Aが高級牛丼
subtitles.english: The first one I ate, A, is the high-end gyudon.

subtitles.original: その次が一般的な牛丼で
subtitles.english: The next one is the generic gyudon.

subtitles.original: 最後に食べたのが ちょこ先生♡ チュッチュラだと思います
subtitles.english: And the last one I ate is Choco-sensei. I'm sure of it.

subtitles.original: あ なるほど これ理由は？
subtitles.english: Ah, I see. And the reason?

subtitles.original: まず 最初の牛丼なんですけど 味がね 色々な
subtitles.english: Well, for the first gyudon, the flavor had various...

subtitles.original: 特に一般的牛丼は もう何度も食べ続けてて思うんですけど
subtitles.english: Especially the generic one, I've eaten it so many times.

subtitles.original: あの甘めな牛丼もあるんですよ はいはいはい
subtitles.english: You know, there are sweet gyudons too. Yes, yes, yes.

subtitles.original: でも 多分今回色味からして 多分一般的な牛丼は
subtitles.english: But this time, judging by the color, the generic one...

subtitles.original: あ あそこだなと思ったんですよね そう とある所で
subtitles.english: I thought, 'Ah, it must be from there.' Yes, from a certain place.

subtitles.original: そこは 甘くないんですよ 甘め少なめ
subtitles.english: The gyudon there isn't sweet. It's less sweet.

subtitles.original: え そこまでリサーチ済み？
subtitles.english: Eh, you've researched that much?

subtitles.original: いやもう 色味で分かる 色味でちょっと あの濃い茶色とかだと
subtitles.english: No, I can tell by the color. If it's a dark brown...

subtitles.original: 結構味が付けられてるんだけど やっぱね あのちょっと味が何て言うの
subtitles.english: It's usually heavily flavored, but you know, the flavor is...

subtitles.original: 白っぽいというか その それは あのさっぱりとして 何杯でもいけるぞっていう
subtitles.english: Sort of pale? It's light, and you feel like you could eat many bowls.

subtitles.original: 感じの はいはいはい で なった時に
subtitles.english: That kind of feeling. Yes, yes. And when that happened...

subtitles.original: Aは味が濃かったんですよ
subtitles.english: A had a rich flavor.

subtitles.original: お なるほど 濃くて お肉が 結構ね 何か
subtitles.english: Oh, I see. It was rich, and the meat was... like...

subtitles.original: とろける感じ ちょっと脂身とかも はいはいはい
subtitles.english: It had a melting texture. The fat too... Yes, yes.

subtitles.original: っていう感じがしたんで高級牛丼 でもちょっとここはね まだわかんなかった
subtitles.english: That's why I thought it was high-end. But I wasn't 100% sure yet.

subtitles.original: 色味的に 濃いのが２種類あったから で
subtitles.english: Because there were two dark-colored ones. And...

subtitles.original: Bが食べた瞬間に あ いつもの！って思いました
subtitles.english: The moment I tasted B, I thought, 'Ah, the usual one!'

subtitles.original: おお さすが さすが お肉の感じした あの舌触りとか
subtitles.english: Oh, as expected! The texture of the meat, the mouthfeel...

subtitles.original: うんうん 何かもうスルスル入る感じが もう一般牛丼かなと思って
subtitles.english: Yeah, it just went down so smoothly. I thought, 'This must be the generic one.'

subtitles.original: で 最後は おお はい
subtitles.english: And finally... Oh, yes.
